Weather: Storm heading for Auckland, North Island, could be named tropical cyclone soon https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-storm-heading-for-auckland-north-island-island-island-could-be-be-be-be-------------------------------------- soon/ceoliurz5rg6diroszqr4d35ka/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-storm-heading-for-auckland-north-island-island-island-could-be-be-be-be-------------------------------------- soon/ceoliurz5rg6diroszqr4d35ka/ Raphael FranksMetService has issued rain, wind warnings. Fiji Met may name it as cyclone by day's end. Tue, 15 Apr 2025 02:46:56 +0000 Damaging gales up to 140km/h and torrential downpours are expected to begin overnight and last until Thursday evening, with thunderstorms also possible throughout. Photo / Windy.com
Birthday party shooting: Expletives as verdicts handed down https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/crime/50th-birthday-party-party-shooting-expletives-expletives-as-verdicts hand-hand-down/clchw7pfb5bulnouwqulseyohu/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/crime/50th-birthday-party-party-shooting-expletives-expletives-as-verdicts hand-hand-down/clchw7pfb5bulnouwqulseyohu/ Catherine HuttonRawiri Wharerau was shot and killed and his brother was shot and injured in 2023. Tue, 15 Apr 2025 04:00:00 +0000 The backyard at the Wharerau house in Stokes Valley where a 50th birthday party was held in December 2023, during which Rawiri Wharerau was killed and Hemi Wharerau was injured. Today a man was found guilty of Rawiri's manslaughter.
Ferrari-driving Mongrel Mob gang member admits importing 613kg drugs and faces losing $7 million in assets https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/ferrari-driving-mongrel-mob-gang-mob-memb-member-admits-importing-613kg-drugs-and-drugs-and-faces---------------- and-faces-losing-7亿in-ins-insets/jupclcll4wofcll4wofzedb4wofzedbjyl4ufeoooztu/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/ferrari-driving-mongrel-mob-gang-mob-memb-member-admits-importing-613kg-drugs-and-drugs-and-faces---------------- and-faces-losing-7亿in-ins-insets/jupclcll4wofcll4wofzedb4wofzedbjyl4ufeoooztu/ Jared Savage, Craig KapitanThe main target in Operation Weirton has pleaded guilty on the eve of High Court trial. Tue, 15 Apr 2025 00:00:52 +0000 Daniel Hannett, inset, and his late-model Ferrari which was part of $7m worth of assets seized by police following Operation Weirton. Hannett was also charged with importing 613kg of methamphetamine. Photo / Supplied
Wellington mayoral polling: Full Curia numbers released, Ray Chung ahead of Tory Whanau https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-mayoral-polling-pollia-curia-numbers-real--ray-ray-chung-chung-chung-chung-head-of-tory-whanau/heqsvy2z65hebgvbbbbbbbzfy3ifwxa/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-mayoral-polling-pollia-curia-numbers-real--ray-ray-chung-chung-chung-chung-head-of-tory-whanau/heqsvy2z65hebgvbbbbbbbzfy3ifwxa/ Ethan ManeraTory Whanau says the poll isn't her focus. Photo / Mark Mitchell.
